summary_paragraph: Anuva Goyal is an energetic and innovative engineering undergraduate pursuing a B.Tech in Electrical Engineering with a specialization in Computer Science.  She possesses a strong foundation in programming languages (Python, Java, C++, etc.) and machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, OpenCV).  Her experience includes internships at Genisup India Pvt. Ltd. and VUGS Technologies, where she worked on projects involving NLP, OCR, and data classification.  Her diverse project portfolio showcases skills in building machine learning models, web scraping, and developing applications like chatbots and recommender systems.  She actively seeks opportunities for professional growth and is passionate about applying her skills to solve real-world problems.
